name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Town & Country Lodge

reviews.text: I've stayed at this property several times over the past few years, and each time I've received great service, a wonderful clean room, and a filling breakfast the next morning.
reviews.title: A great place to spend a night!

reviews.text: One of the things that is a wild card when getting a hotel room along 99 is how clean the room is going to be when you check in. I've had rooms at other properties before where there have been grease (and other) stains on the bedspreads and carpet, burns and stains on the sink and fixtures, and suspect bathrooms. In my several stays at this property cleanliness has never been an issue. Each time my room has been spotless.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Price

aka: Best Western Plus Town & Country Hotel
